-[ipv4 : 0.0.0.255] - 0

[CIDR bitmaps]
Host address		- 00000000.00000000.00000000.11111111
Network address		- 00000000.00000000.00000000.11111111
Network mask		- 11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111
Broadcast address	- 00000000.00000000.00000000.11111111
Cisco wildcard		- 00000000.00000000.00000000.00000000
Network range		- 00000000.00000000.00000000.11111111 -
			  00000000.00000000.00000000.11111111

[WILDCARD]
Wildcard		- 0.0.0.255
Network mask		- 255.255.255.0
Network mask (bits)	- 24

-
